title: How to please have a typical example of a business plan - Quora

response.answer_text: Google is an endless resource for questions like these. I suggest that you start with a general search for “business plan examples” and “business plan templates.” Throughout your search you will find information that will allow you to make your search queries more specific. Eventually you can drill down to finding examples and templates for business plans specifically in your business area. In a couple of hours of searching, you should have enough information to begin putting together your own business plan. Yes, there will be a need for customisation. But this actually removes the need to write the entire plan from nothing. Iteration is truly the new invention. You don't have to come up with this from scratch.

There are 500+ Free Sample Business Plans available for free, complete with appendices and financial projections, at Bplans: Business Planning Resources and Free Business Plan Samples - Bplans offers free business plan samples and templates, business planning resources, How-to articles, financial calculators, industry reports and entrepreneurship webinars.
